Talent.Name: Adversary
Talent.Description: Upgrade the difficulty of any combat check targeting this character once per rank of Adversary.

Talent.Name: Anatomy Lessons
Talent.Description: After making a successful attack, may spend 1 Destiny Point to add damage equal to Intellect to one hit.

Talent.Name: Armor Master
Talent.Description: When wearing armor, Increase total soak value by 1.

Talent.Name: Armor Master (Improved)
Talent.Description: When wearing armor with a soak value of 2 or higher, increase defense by 1.

Talent.Name: Bad Motivator
Talent.Description: Once per game session, may take a Bad Motivator action; make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Mechanics check[b] to cause one targeted device to spontaneously fail.

Talent.Name: Bacta Specialist
Talent.Description: Patients recover 1 additional wound per rank of Bacta Specialist when they recover wounds from bacta tanks or long term care.

Talent.Name: Balance
Talent.Description: When the character heals strain at the end of the encounter, he may add [FO] per Force Rating. He recovers additional strain equal to [LI] generated.

Talent.Name: Barrage
Talent.Description: Add 1 damage per rank of Barrage to 1 hit of successful attack while using Ranged (Heavy) or Gunnery skills at long or extreme range.
Talent.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

Talent.Name: Black Market Contacts
Talent.Description: When purchasing illegal goods, may reduce rarity by 1 per rank of Black Market Contacts, increasing cost by 50 percent of base cost per reduction.
Talent.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

Talent.Name: Blooded
Talent.Description: Add [BO] per rank of Blooded to all checks to resist or recover from poisons, venoms, or toxins. Reduce duration of ongoing poisons by 1 round per rank of Blooded to a minimum of 1.

Talent.Name: Body Guard
Talent.Description: Once per round, perform the Body Guard maneuver to guard an engaged character. Suffer a number of strain no greater than ranks of Body Guard, then until the beginning of the next turn upgrade the difficulty of combat checks targeting the character by that number.

Talent.Name: Brace
Talent.Description: Perform the Brace maneuver to remove [SE] per rank of Brace from next Action. This may only remove [SE] added by environmental circumstances.

Talent.Name: Brilliant Evasion
Talent.Description: Once per encounter may take Brilliant Evasion action. Select 1 opponent and make Opposed Piloting (Planetary or Space) check to stop opponent from attacking character for rounds equal to Agility.

Talent.Name: Bypass Security
Talent.Description: Remove [SE] per rank of Bypass Security from checks made to disable a security device or open a locked door.

Talent.Name: Codebreaker
Talent.Description: Remove [SE] per rank in Codebreaker from checks to break codes or decrypt communications. Decrease difficulty of checks to break codes or decrypt communications by 1.

Talent.Name: Command
Talent.Description: Add [BO] per rank of Command when making Leadership checks. Affected targets add [BO] to Discipline checks for next 24 hours.

Talent.Name: Confidence
Talent.Description: May decrease difficulty of Discipline checks to avoid fear by 1 per rank of Confidence.

Talent.Name: Contraption
Talent.Description: Once per session, take Contraption action; make a [B] Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Mechanics check[b] to fashion a device to solve a current problem using just the tools and parts on hand.

Talent.Name: Convincing Demeanor
Talent.Description: Remove [SE] per rank of Convincing Demeanor from any Deception or Skulduggery checks.

Talent.Name: Crippling Blow
Talent.Description: Increase the difficulty of next combat check by 1. If check deals damage, target suffers 1 strain whenever he moves for the remainder of the encounter.

Talent.Name: Dead to Rights
Talent.Description: Spend 1 Destiny Point to add additional damage equal to half Agility (rounded-up) to one hit of successful attack made with ship or vehicle-mounted weaponry.

Talent.Name: Dead to Rights (Improved)
Talent.Description: Spend 1 Destiny Point to add additional damage equal to Agility (rounded up) to one hit of successful attack made with ship or vehicle-mounted weaponry.

Talent.Name: Deadly Accuracy
Talent.Description: When acquired, choose 1 combat skill. Add damage equal to ranks in that skill to one hit of successful attack made using that skill.

Talent.Name: Dedication
Talent.Description: Gain +1 to a single characteristic. This cannot bring a characteristic above 6.

Talent.Name: Defensive Driving
Talent.Description: Increase defense of vehicle or starship being piloted by 1 per rank of Defensive Driving.

Talent.Name: Defensive Slicing
Talent.Description: When defending computer systems, add [SE] per rank of Defensive Slicing to opponent's checks.

Talent.Name: Defensive Slicing (Improved)
Talent.Description: Defensive Slicing now upgrades opponents' difficulty once per rank of Defensive Slicing, this replaces the usual benefits.

Talent.Name: Defensive Stance
Talent.Description: Once per round, may perform Defensive Stance maneuver and suffer a number of strain to upgrade difficulty of all incoming melee attacks by an equal number. Strain suffered this way cannot exceed ranks in Defensive Stance.

Talent.Name: Disorient
Talent.Description: After hitting with combat check, may spend [AD][AD] to disorient target for number of rounds equal to ranks in Disorient.

Talent.Name: Dodge
Talent.Description: When targeted by combat check, may perform a Dodge incidental to suffer a number of strain no greater than ranks of Dodge, then upgrade the difficulty of the check by that number.

Talent.Name: Durable
Talent.Description: May reduce any Critical Injury suffered by 10 per rank of Durable to a minimum of 1.

Talent.Name: Enduring
Talent.Description: Gain +1 soak value.

Talent.Name: Expert Tracker
Talent.Description: Remove [SE] per rank of Expert Tracker from checks to find tracks or track targets. Decrease time to track a target by half.

Talent.Name: Familiar Suns
Talent.Description: Once per session, may perform a Familiar Suns maneuver; make a [B] Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Knowledge (Outer Rim)[b] or [B](Core Worlds) check[b] to reveal the current type of planetary environment and other useful information.

Talent.Name: Feral Strength
Talent.Description: Add 1 damage per rank of Feral Strength to one hit of successful attacks made using Brawl or Melee skills.

Talent.Name: Field Commander
Talent.Description: Take the Field Commander action; make a [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Leadership check[b]. A number of allies equal to Presence may immediately suffer 1 strain to perform 1 free maneuver.

Talent.Name: Field Commander (Improved)
Talent.Description: Field Commander action affects allies equal to double Presence, and may spend [TR] to allow allies to suffer 1 strain and perform 1 free action instead.

Talent.Name: Fine Tuning
Talent.Description: When reducing the amount of system strain a starship or vehicle suffers, reduce 1 additional strain per rank of Fine Tuning.

Talent.Name: Forager
Talent.Description: Remove up to [SE][SE] from skill checks to find food, water, or shelter. Survival checks to forage take half the time.

Talent.Name: Force Rating
Talent.Description: Gain +1 Force Rating.

Talent.Name: Frenzied Attack
Talent.Description: When making a Melee or Brawl check, suffer a number of strain to upgrade the attack an equal number of times. The strain suffered may not exceed ranks in Frenzied Attack.

Talent.Name: Full Throttle
Talent.Description: Take a Full Throttle action; make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Piloting check[b] to increase a vehicle's top speed by 1 for a number of rounds equal to Cunning.

Talent.Name: Full Throttle (Improved)
Talent.Description: Suffer 1 strain to attempt Full Throttle as a maneuver and decrease its difficultly to [B]Average ([DI][DI])[b].

Talent.Name: Full Throttle (Supreme)
Talent.Description: When performing Full Throttle, top speed increases by 2 instead of 1.

Talent.Name: Galaxy Mapper
Talent.Description: Remove [SE] per rank of Galaxy Mapper from Astrogation checks. Astrogation checks take half normal time.

Talent.Name: Gearhead
Talent.Description: Remove [SE] per rank of Gearhead from Mechanics checks. Have the credit cost to add mods to attachments.

Talent.Name: Grit
Talent.Description: Gain +1 strain threshold

Talent.Name: Hard Headed
Talent.Description: When staggered or disoriented, perform the Hard Headed action; make a [B]Daunting ([DI][DI][DI][DI]) Discipline check[b] to remove status. Difficulty reduced per rank of Hard Headed.

Talent.Name: Hard Headed (Improved)
Talent.Description: When incapacitated due to strain exceeding threshold, may take a more difficult. Hard Headed action to reduce strain to 1 below threshold.

Talent.Name: Heightened Awareness
Talent.Description: Allies within close range add [BO] to Perception or Vigilance checks. Engaged allies add [BO][BO].

Talent.Name: Heroic Fortitude
Talent.Description: May spend 1 Destiny Point to ignore effects of Critical Injuries on Brawn or Agility checks until the end of the encounter.

Talent.Name: Hidden Storage
Talent.Description: Gain hidden storage in vehicles or equipment that holds items with total encumbrance equal to ranks in Hidden Storage.

Talent.Name: Hold Together
Talent.Description: Spend 1 Destiny Point to perform a Hold Together incidental immediately after vehicle or starship takes damage to turn it into system strain.

Talent.Name: Hunter
Talent.Description: Add [BO] per rank of Hunter to all checks when interacting with beast or animals (including combat checks). Add +10 to Critical Injury results against beasts or animals per rank of Hunter.

Talent.Name: Indistinguishable
Talent.Description: Upgrade difficulty of checks to identify character once per rank of Indistinguishable.

Talent.Name: Insight
Talent.Description: Perception and Discipline become career skills.

Talent.Name: Inspiring Rhetoric
Talent.Description: Take the Inspiring Rhetoric action; making an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Leadership check[b]. Each [SU], 1 ally within close range recovers 1 strain. Spend [AD] to cause 1 affected ally to recover 1 additional strain.

Talent.Name: Inspiring Rhetoric (Improved)
Talent.Description: Each ally affected by Inspiring Rhetoric gains [BO] on all skill checks for a number of rounds equal to ranks in Leadership.

Talent.Name: Inspiring Rhetoric (Supreme)
Talent.Description: Suffer 1 strain to perform Inspiring Rhetoric as a maneuver, not an action.

Talent.Name: Intense Focus
Talent.Description: Perform an Intense Focus maneuver; suffer 1 strain and upgrade the ability of the next skill check once.

Talent.Name: Intense Presence
Talent.Description: Spend 1 Destiny Point to recover strain equal to Presence rating.

Talent.Name: Intimidating
Talent.Description: May suffer a number of strain to downgrade difficulty of Coercion checks, or upgrade difficulty when targeted by Coercion checks, by an equal number. Strain suffered this way cannot exceed ranks in Intimidating.

Talent.Name: Inventor
Talent.Description: When constructing new items or modifying existing attachments, add [BO] or remove [SE] per rank of Inventor.

Talent.Name: Jump Up
Talent.Description: Once per round, may stand from seated or prone as an incidental.

Talent.Name: Jury Rigged
Talent.Description: Choose 1 weapon, armor, or other item and give it a permanent improvement while it remains in use.

Talent.Name: Kill With Kindness
Talent.Description: Remove [SE] per rank of Kill with Kindness from all Charm and Leadership checks.

Talent.Name: Knockdown
Talent.Description: After hitting with a melee attack, may spend [TR] to knock the target prone.

Talent.Name: Know Somebody
Talent.Description: Once per session, when attempting to purchase a legally available item, reduce its rarity by 1 per rank of Know Somebody.

Talent.Name: Knowledge Specialization
Talent.Description: When acquired, choose 1 Knowledge skill. When making that skill check, may spend [TR] result to gain additional successes equal to ranks in Knowledge Specialization.

Talent.Name: Known Schematic
Talent.Description: Once per session, may perform the Known Schematic maneuver; make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Knowledge (Education) check[b]. Success grants familiarity with a building or ship's design.

Talent.Name: Let's Ride
Talent.Description: Once per round, may mount or dismount a vehicle or beast, or enter a cockpit or weapon station on a vehicle, as an incidental.

Talent.Name: Lethal Blows
Talent.Description: Add +10 per rank of Lethal Blows to any Critical Injury results inflicted on opponents.

Talent.Name: Master Doctor
Talent.Description: Once per round, suffer 2 strain to decrease the difficulty of a Medicine check by 1.

Talent.Name: Master Merchant
Talent.Description: When buying or selling goods, or paying off or taking Obligation, may suffer 2 strain to sell for 25% more, but for 25% less, pay off 1 more Obligation, or take 1 less.

Talent.Name: Master of Shadows
Talent.Description: Once per round, suffer 2 strain to decrease difficulty of next Stealth or Skulduggery check by one.

Talent.Name: Master Pilot
Talent.Description: Once per round when piloting a starship, may suffer 2 strain to perform any action as a maneuver.

Talent.Name: Master Slicer
Talent.Description: Once per round, may take a Master Sliver incidental to suffer 2 strain and decrease difficulty of Computers or other slicing checks by 1 to a minimum of [B]Easy ([DI])[b].

Talent.Name: Master Starhopper
Talent.Description: Once per round, suffer 2 strain to decrease the difficulty of next Astrogation check by 1 to a minimum of [B]Easy ([DI])[b].

Talent.Name: Mental Fortress
Talent.Description: Spend 1 Destiny Point to ignore effects of Critical Injuries on Intellect or Cunning checks until end of encounter.

Talent.Name: Natural Brawler
Talent.Description: Once per session, may reroll any 1 Brawl or Melee check.

Talent.Name: Natural Charmer
Talent.Description: Once per session, may reroll 1 Charm or Deception check.

Talent.Name: Natural Doctor
Talent.Description: Once per session, may reroll any 1 Medicine check.

Talent.Name: Natural Enforcer
Talent.Description: Once per session, may reroll any 1 Coercion or Streetwise check.

Talent.Name: Natural Hunter
Talent.Description: Once per session, may reroll any 1 Perception or Vigilance check.

Talent.Name: Natural Marksman
Talent.Description: Once per session, may reroll any 1 Ranged (Light) or Ranged (Heavy) check.

Talent.Name: Natural Negotiator
Talent.Description: Once per session, may reroll any 1 Cool or Negotiation check.

Talent.Name: Natural Outdoorsman
Talent.Description: Once per session, may reroll any 1 Resilience or Survival check.

Talent.Name: Natural Pilot
Talent.Description: Once per session, may reroll any Piloting (Space) or Gunnery check.

Talent.Name: Natural Programmer
Talent.Description: Once per session, may reroll any 1 Computers or Astrogation check.

Talent.Name: Natural Rogue
Talent.Description: Once per session, may reroll any 1 Skulduggery or Stealth check.

Talent.Name: Natural Scholar
Talent.Description: Once per session, may reroll any 1 Knowledge skill check.

Talent.Name: Natural Tinkerer
Talent.Description: Once per session, may reroll any 1 Mechanics check.

Talent.Name: Nobody's Fool
Talent.Description: May upgrade difficulty of incoming Charm, Coercion, or Deception checks once per rank of Nobody's Fool.

Talent.Name: Outdoorsman
Talent.Description: Remove [SE] per rank of Outdoorsman from checks to move through terrain or manage environmental effects. Decrease overland travel times by half.

Talent.Name: Overwhelm Emotions
Talent.Description: May add [FO] per Force Rating to Charm, Coercion, or Deception checks. [LI] and [DA] add [SU] to some checks and [FA] to others.
Talent.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

Talent.Name: Plausible Deniability
Talent.Description: Remove [SE] per rank of Plausible Deniability from all Coercion and Deception checks.

Talent.Name: Point Blank
Talent.Description: Add 1 damage per rank of Point Blank to damage of one hit of successful attack while using Ranged (Heavy) or Ranged (Light) skills at short range or engaged.

Talent.Name: Precise Aim
Talent.Description: Once per round, may perform Precise Aim maneuver. Suffer a number of strain no greater than ranks in Precise Aim, then reduce target's melee and ranged defense by that number.
Talent.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

Talent.Name: Pressure Point
Talent.Description: When making a Brawl check against an opponent, instead of dealing damage, may deal equivalent strain plus additional strain equal to ranks of Medicine (this ignores soak).
Talent.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

Talent.Name: Quick Draw
Talent.Description: Once per round, draw or holster a weapon or accessible item as an incidental.

Talent.Name: Quick Strike
Talent.Description: Add [BO] per rank of Quick Strike to combat checks against targets that have not acted yet this encounter.

Talent.Name: Rapid Reaction
Talent.Description: Suffer a number of strain to add an equal number of [SU] to initiative checks. Strain suffered cannot exceed ranks in Rapid Reaction.

Talent.Name: Rapid Recovery
Talent.Description: When healing strain after an encounter, heal 1 additional strain per rank of Rapid Recovery.

Talent.Name: Redundant Systems
Talent.Description: Once per session, may take a Redundant Systems action; make an [B]Easy ([DI]) Mechanics check[b] to harvest components from a functioning device to repair a broken one without breaking the first device.

Talent.Name: Surgeon
Talent.Description: When making a Medicine check to help a character heal wounds, the target heals 1 additional wound per rank of Surgeon.

Talent.Name: Resolve
Talent.Description: When a character involuntarily suffers strain, he suffers 1 less strain per tank of Resolve to a minimum of 1.

Talent.Name: Stim Application
Talent.Description: Take the Stim Application Action; make an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Medicine check[b]. If successful 1 engaged ally increases 1 characteristic by 1 for the remained of the encounter and suffers 4 strain.

Talent.Name: Stim Application (Improved)
Talent.Description: When performing Stim Application Action, may increase difficulty of check to [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI])[b], and target only suffers 1 strain.

Talent.Name: Toughened
Talent.Description: Gain +2 wound threshold.

Talent.Name: Stim Application (Supreme)
Talent.Description: When performing ther Stim Application Action, spend [TR] to increase an additional Characteristic by 1.

Talent.Name: Stalker
Talent.Description: Add [BO] per rank of Stalker to all Stealth and Coordination checks.

Talent.Name: Targeted Blow
Talent.Description: After making a successful attack, may spend 1 Destiny Point to add damage equal to Agility to one hit.

Talent.Name: Sniper Shot
Talent.Description: Before making a non-thrown ranged attack, may perform a Sniper Shot maneuver to increase the weapon's range by 1 range band per rank in Sniper Shot. Upgrade the difficulty of the attack by 1 per range band increase.

Talent.Name: Spare Clip
Talent.Description: Cannot run out of ammo due to [DE]. Items with Limited Ammo quality run out of ammo as normal.

Talent.Name: Stunning Blow
Talent.Description: While making Melee checks, may inflict damage as strain instead of wounds. This does not ignore soak.

Talent.Name: Tinkerer
Talent.Description: May add 1 additional hard point to a number of items equal to ranks in Tinkerer. Each item may only be modified once.

Talent.Name: Stunning Blow (Improved)
Talent.Description: When dealing strain damage with Melee or Brawl checks, may spend [TR] to stagger target for 1 round per [TR]

Talent.Name: Swift
Talent.Description: Do not suffer usual penalties for moving through difficult terrain.

Talent.Name: Soft Spot
Talent.Description: After making a successful attack, may spend 1 Destiny Point to add damage equal to Cunning to one hit.

Talent.Name: Scathing Tirade
Talent.Description: Take a Scathing Tirade action; make an [B] Average ([DI][DI]) Coercion check[b]. Each [SU] causes one enemy in short range to suffer 1 strain. Spend [AD] to cause 1 affected enemy to suffer 1 additional strain.

Talent.Name: Scathing Tirade (Improved)
Talent.Description: Each enemy affected by Scathing Tirade suffers [SE] on all skill checks for a number of rounds equal to ranks in Coercion.

Talent.Name: Well Rounded
Talent.Description: Choose any 2 skills. They permanently become career skills.

Talent.Name: Scathing Tirade (Supreme)
Talent.Description: Suffer 1 strain to perform Scathing Tirade as a maneuver, not an action.

Talent.Name: Steely Nerves
Talent.Description: Spend 1 Destiny Point to ignore effects of Critical Injuries on Willpower or Presence checks until the end of the encounter.

Talent.Name: Respected Scholar
Talent.Description: May downgrade difficulty of checks to interact with institutes of learning by one level per rank of Respected Scholar.

Talent.Name: Speaks Binary
Talent.Description: When directing NPC droids, may grant them [BO] per rank of Speaks Binary on checks.

Talent.Name: Researcher
Talent.Description: Remove [SE] per rank of Researcher from all Knowledge checks. Reserching a subject takes half the time.

Talent.Name: Stroke of Genius
Talent.Description: Once per session, make one skill check using Intellect rather than the characteristic linked to that skill.

Talent.Name: Street Smarts
Talent.Description: Remove [SE] per rank of Street Smarts from Streetwise or Knowledge (Underworld) checks.

Talent.Name: Skilled Jockey
Talent.Description: Remove [SE] per rank of Skilled Jockey from all Piloting (Planetary) and Piloting (Space) checks the character attempts.

Talent.Name: Short Cut
Talent.Description: During a chase; add [BO] per rank in Shortcut to any checks made to catch or escape an opponent.

Talent.Name: Utility Belt
Talent.Description: Spend 1 Destiny Point to perform a Utility Belt incidental; produce a previously undocumented item or weapon (with restrictions) from a tool belt or a satchel.

Talent.Name: Wheel and Deal
Talent.Description: When selling good legally, gain 10% more credits per rank of Wheel and Deal.

Talent.Name: Smooth Talker
Talent.Description: When first acquired choose 1 skill; Charm, Coercion, Deception, or Negotiation. When making checks with that skill spend [TR] to gain additional [SU] equal to ranks in Smooth Talker.

Talent.Name: Side Step
Talent.Description: Once per round, may perform Side Step maneuver and suffer a number of strain to upgrade difficulty of all incoming ranged attacks by an equal number for the next round. Strain suffered this way cannot exceed ranks in Side Step.

Talent.Name: Second Wind
Talent.Description: Once per encounter, may use Second Wind incidental to heal strain equal to ranks in Second Wind.

Talent.Name: Strong Arm
Talent.Description: Treat thrown weapons as if they had 1 greater range.

Talent.Name: True Aim
Talent.Description: Once per round, may perform a True Aim maneuver to gain benefits of aiming and upgrade combat check once per rank of True Aim.

Talent.Name: Tricky Target
Talent.Description: Count vehicle or starship piloted as having a silhouette 1 lower when being attacked.

Talent.Name: Solid Repairs
Talent.Description: The character repairs +1 hull trauma per rank of Solid Repairs whenever he repairs a starship or vehicle.

Talent.Name: Utinni!
Talent.Description: Remove [SE] per rank of Utinni! from checks to find or scavenge items or gear. Such checks take half the time.
Talent.Source: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook

Talent.Name: Technical Aptitude
Talent.Description: Reduces time needed to complete Computer-related tasks by 25% per rank.

Talent.Name: Skilled Slicer
Talent.Description: When making a Computers check may spend [TR] to make further Computers checks within this system as maneuvers.

Talent.Name: Uncanny Senses
Talent.Description: Add [BO] per rank of Uncanny Senses to all Perception checks.

Talent.Name: Uncanny Reactions
Talent.Description: Add [BO] per rank of Uncanny Reactions to all Vigilance checks.

Talent.Name: Sense Danger
Talent.Description: Once per session, remove [SE][SE] from any 1 check.

Talent.Name: Sense Emotions
Talent.Description: Add [BO] to all Charm, Coercion, and Deception checks unless the target is immune to Force powers.

Talent.Name: Touch of Fate
Talent.Description: Once per session, add [BO][BO] to any 1 check.

Talent.Name: Sixth Sense
Talent.Description: Gain +1 ranged defense.

Talent.Name: Superior Reflexes
Talent.Description: Gain +1 melee damage.

Talent.Name: Pin
Talent.Description: Take Pin action; make an [B]Opposed athletics check[b] to immobilize an engaged opponent until the end of the character's next turn. Spend [TR] to extend duration one round.

Talent.Name: Museum Worthy
Talent.Description: Once per session, take Museum Worthy action, make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Knowledge (Education) check[b] to ascetain information regarding a relic, ruin, or piece of history.

Talent.Name: Hunter's Quarry
Talent.Description: Take Hunter's Quarry action, make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Survival check[b] to upgrade the ability of all attacks made against a target at long range until the end of the character's next turn.

Talent.Name: Hunter's Quarry (Improved)
Talent.Description: Suffer 2 strain to perform Hunter's Quarry action as a maneuver.

Talent.Name: Bring It Down
Talent.Description: Once per attack, spend 1 Destiny Point to add damage to a single hit equal to target's Brawn value.

Talent.Name: All-Terrain Driver
Talent.Description: Do not suffer usual penalties for driving through different terrain when using Piloting (Planetary).

Talent.Name: Natural Driver
Talent.Description: Once per session, may reroll any 1 Piloting (Planetary) or Gunnery check.

Talent.Name: Full Stop
Talent.Description: When piloting a ship or vehicle, take a full-stop maneuver to reduce speed to zero and suffer system strain equal to the speed reduced.

Talent.Name: Master Driver
Talent.Description: Once per round when driving a vehicle, may suffer 2 strain to perform any action as a maneuver.

Talent.Name: Sound Investments
Talent.Description: At the start of each session, gain 100 credits for each rank of Sound Investments.

Talent.Name: Greased Palms
Talent.Description: Before making a social check, may spend up to 50 credits per rank of Greased Palms to upgrade the ability of the check once for every 50 spent.

Talent.Name: Throwing Credits
Talent.Description: At beginning of session, spend 100 credits to ignore strain threshold penalty due to triggered Obligation.

Talent.Name: Bought Info
Talent.Description: Instead of making a Knowledge check, may take a Bought Info action; spend credits equal to 50 times the difficulty of the check to pass with one [SU].

Talent.Name: Natural Merchant
Talent.Description: Once per session, may reroll any 1 Streetwise or Negotiation check.

Talent.Name: Good Cop
Talent.Description: May spend [AD][AD] from a Charm or Negotiation check to upgrade ability of a single ally's subsequent Social Interaction check against the target a number of times equal to ranks in Good Cop.

Talent.Name: Bad Cop
Talent.Description: May spend [AD][AD] from a Deception or Coercion check to upgrade ability of a single ally's subsequent Social Interaction check against the target a number of times equal to ranks in Bad Cop.

Talent.Name: Unrelenting Skeptic
Talent.Description: When targeted by a Deception check, the character automatically adds [FA] to the check equal to ranks in Vigilance.

Talent.Name: Unrelenting Skeptic (Improved)
Talent.Description: When targeted by a Deception check that fails, may spend 1 Destiny Point to add [DE] to results.

Talent.Name: Distracting Behavior
Talent.Description: Make a Distracting Behavior maneuver and suffer strain no greater than ranks in Cunning. Until the beginning of next turn, equal number of NPC's suffer [TH] on checks. Range increases with additional ranks.

Talent.Name: Congenial
Talent.Description: May suffer a number of strain to downgrade difficulty of Charm or Negotiation checks or upgrade difficulty when target by Charm or Negotiation checks, by an equal number Strain suffered this way cannot exceed ranks in Congenial.

Talent.Name: Natural Athlete
Talent.Description: Once per session, reroll any 1 Athletics or Coordination check.

Talent.Name: Distracting Behavior (Improved)
Talent.Description: The Distracting Behavior maneuver inflicts [TH][TH] on NPC's checks when NPC's target character's allies.

Talent.Name: Biggest Fan
Talent.Description: Once per session, may take a Biggest Fan action; make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Charm check[b] to turn one NPC into the character's biggest fan.

Talent.Name: Deceptive Taunt
Talent.Description: Once per session, may make Deceptive Taunt action. Make opposed Deception check. If successful, one adversary must attack the character during adversary's next turn.

Talent.Name: Coordination Dodge
Talent.Description: When targeted by a combat check, may spend 1 Destiny Point to add [FA] equal to ranks in Coordination to check.

Talent.Name: Powerful Blast
Talent.Description: Increase Blast damage dealt by explosives, explosive weapons, and grenafes by +1 per rank of Powerful Blast.

Talent.Name: Selective Detonation
Talent.Description: When using a weapon with the Blast quality spend [AD] to exclude 1 target that would be affected by the explosion, up to ranks in Selective Detonation.

Talent.Name: Steady Nerves
Talent.Description: Remove [SE] per rank of Steady Nerves from Cool or Skulduggery checks.

Talent.Name: Time to Go
Talent.Description: The character may spend 1 Destiny Point to perform a Move maneuver as an incidental to attempt to move into cover or out of the blast range of a weapon or explosion.

Talent.Name: Time to Go (Improved)
Talent.Description: When activating Time to Go, allow 1 engaged ally to also perform an out of turn Move maneuver as an incidental to attempt to move into cover or out of the blast range of a weapon or explosion.

Talent.Name: Improvised Detonation
Talent.Description: Once per session, make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Mechanics check[b] to perform the Improvised Detonation action and build an explosive device, dealing damage equal to ranks in Intellect + ranks in Mechanics + [SU]

Talent.Name: Improvised Detonation (Improved)
Talent.Description: Reduce the difficulty of Improvis Detonation to [B]Average ([DI][DI]) and increase damage to twice ranks in Mechanics.

Talent.Name: Master Grenadier
Talent.Description: Decrease the [AD] cost to activate the Blast quality on any weapon used by 1 to a minimum of 1.

Talent.Name: Fearsome
Talent.Description: When an adversary becomes engaged with the character, the character may force the adversary to make a fear check, with the difficulty equal to the character's ranks in Fearsome.

Talent.Name: Talk the Talk
Talent.Description: When making a Knowledge skill check, the character may spend 1 Destiny Point to substitute Knowledge (Underworld) or Streetwise for the required skill.

Talent.Name: Loom
Talent.Description: When an ally engaged with the character makes a successful Charm, Deception, or Negotiation check, the character adds [AD] per rank in Coercion to the ally's check.

Talent.Name: Walk the Walk
Talent.Description: The character may spend 1 Destiny Point to add damage equal to his ranks in Streetwise to one hit of a successful Brawl check.

Talent.Name: Burly
Talent.Description: Reduce any weilded weapon's Cumbersome quality and Encumberance rating by a nyumber equal to ranks in Burly to a minimum of 1.

Talent.Name: Rain of Death
Talent.Description: Perform the Rain of Death maneuver to ignore the increased difficulty due to the Auto-fire quality of attacks made this turn.

Talent.Name: Heroic Resilience
Talent.Description: Immediately after being hit by an attack but before suffering damage, spend 1 Destiny Point to increase soak by ranks in Resiliance.

Talent.Name: Heavy Hitter
Talent.Description: Once per session, spend [TR] on a successful Ranged (Heavy) or Gunnery check to add the Breach 1 quality to the attack, or increase an existing Breach rating by 1.

Talent.Name: Disarming Smile
Talent.Description: Take the Disarming Smile action; succeed at an opposed Charm check to lower all defenses of a target by ranks in Disarming Smile until the end of the encounter.

Talent.Name: Works Like a Charm
Talent.Description: Once per session, make one skill check using Presence rather than the characteristic linked to that skill.

Talent.Name: Just Kidding!
Talent.Description: Once per round as an incidental spend 1 Destiny Point to ignore [DE] generated on a social check by the character or any ally in short range.

Talent.Name: Don't Shoot!
Talent.Description: Once per session as an action, make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Charm check[b]. On a success, cannot be target of combat checks until the end of the encounter or until making a combat check.

Talent.Name: Up the Ante
Talent.Description: When gambling win 10% more credits per rank of Up the Ante.

Talent.Name: Second Chances
Talent.Description: Once per encounter choose a number of positive dice equal to ranks in Second Changes and reroll them.

Talent.Name: Fortune Favors the Bold
Talent.Description: Once per session as an incidental, suffer 2 strain to flip one dark side Destiny Point to light side.

Talent.Name: Clever Solution
Talent.Description: Once per session, make one skill check using Cunning rather than the characteristic linked to that skill.

Talent.Name: Double or Nothing
Talent.Description: Suffer 2 strain to perform the Double or Nothing incidental to increase the difficulty of the next check by one. Then, after canceling opposing symbols, double the amount of remaining [AD]

Talent.Name: Double or Nothing (Improved)
Talent.Description: When performing the Double or Nothing incidental, after canceling opposing symbols, also double the amount of remaining [SU].

Talent.Name: Quickdraw (Improved)
Talent.Description: May use Quick Draw twice per round.

Talent.Name: Call 'Em
Talent.Description: Do not add [SE] to combat checks due to the use of the Aim maneuver.

Talent.Name: Sorry About the Mess
Talent.Description: Decrease the Critical Rating of a weapon by 1 (to a minimum of 1) against targets that have not yet acted this encounter.

Talent.Name: Guns Blazing
Talent.Description: As an incidental, suffer 2 Strain to avoid increasing the difficulty of a Ranged (Light) check to attack with two weapons.

Talent.Name: Spitfire
Talent.Description: After a successful combined check with two Ranged (Light) weapons, additional hits can be allocated to other targets within range of the weapon.

Talent.Name: Double or Nothing (Supreme)
Talent.Description: When performing the Double or Nothing incidental, also double the number of [TR] amd [DE].

Talent.Name: Commanding Presence
Talent.Description: Remove [SE] per rank of Commanding Presence from Leadership and Cool checks.

Talent.Name: Coordinated Assault
Talent.Description: Take the Coordinated Assault maneuver; a number of engaged allies equal to Leadership ranks add [AD] to combat checks until beginning of the next turn. Range increases per rank of Coordinated Assault.

Talent.Name: Debilitating Shot
Talent.Description: Upon successful attack with a starship or vehicle weapon, may spend [AD][AD] to reduce the maximum speed of the target by 1 until the end of the next round.

Talent.Name: Exhaust Port
Talent.Description: Before attacking a starship or vehicle, the character may spend 1 Destiny Point to ignore the effects of the Massive rule for the attack.

Talent.Name: Fire Control
Talent.Description: Take the Fire Control action; all combat checks made from current starship or vehicle count their target's silhouette as one higher than normal until the beginning of next turn. Does not stack.

Talent.Name: Form On Me
Talent.Description: Allies equal to ranks in Leadership in close range gain the benefits of the Gain the Advantage action.

Talent.Name: Master Leader
Talent.Description: Once per round, suffer 2 strain to decrease difficulty of the next Leadership check by one, to a minimum of [B]Easy ([DI]).[b]

Talent.Name: Natural Leader
Talent.Description: Once per session, may reroll any 1 Cool or Leadership check.

Talent.Name: Overwhelm Defenses
Talent.Description: Upon unsuccessful attack with a starship or vehicle weapon, may spend [AD][AD] per rank of Overwhelm Defenses. Reduce the defense in the targeted zone by 1 for every [AD][AD] spent.

Talent.Name: Incite Rebellion
Talent.Description: Once per session, may take an Incite Rebellion action; make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Coercion check[b] to cause a number of beings up to ranks in Coercion to become rebellious until the end of the encounter.

Talent.Name: Careful Planning
Talent.Description: Once per session, may introduce a "fact" into the narrative as if a Destiny Point had been spent.

Talent.Name: Physical Training
Talent.Description: Add [BO] per rank of Physical Training to Athletics and Resilience checks.

Talent.Name: Unstoppable
Talent.Description: If a Critical Injury roll is 1 or reduced to 1, do not receive the critical injury.

Talent.Name: Stimpack Specialization
Talent.Description: Stimpacks heal 1 additional wound per rank of Stimpack Specialization.

Talent.Name: It's Not that Bad
Talent.Description: Once per session when an ally would suffer a Critical Injury, may take an It's Not That Bad action; make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Medicine check[b] to stop the ally from gaining the Critical Injury.

Talent.Name: Quick Fix
Talent.Description: Once per session, make one skill check using Agility rather than the characterstic linked to that skill.

Talent.Name: Basic Combat Training
Talent.Description: Brawl and Ranged (Light) become career skills.

Talent.Name: Tactical Combat Training
Talent.Description: Melee and Ranged (Heavy) become career skills.

Talent.Name: Vehicle Combat Training
Talent.Description: Gunnery and Piloting (Planetary) become career skills.

Talent.Name: Well Travelled
Talent.Description: Knowledge (Core Worlds) and Knowledge (Outer Rim) become career skills.

Talent.Name: Creative Killer
Talent.Description: Reduce the crit rating of improvised weapons by 2 (to a minimum of 1).

Talent.Name: Dynamic Fire
Talent.Description: When making a ranged attack while engaged with an opponent, may suffer 2 strain to reduce the ranged modifier by 1.

Talent.Name: Beast Wrangler
Talent.Description: Add [BO] per rank of Beast Wrangler to checks to tame or wrangle creatures.

Talent.Name: Expert Handler
Talent.Description: Remove [SE] per rank of Expert Handler from Survival checks made to ride beasts.

Talent.Name: Spur
Talent.Description: Take a Spur action; make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Survival check[b] to increase a beast's top speed by 1. The beast suffers 2 strain every round it stays spurred.

Talent.Name: Spur (Improved)
Talent.Description: Suffer 1 strain to attempt Spur as a maneuver and decrease its difficult to [B]Average ([DI][DI]).[b]

Talent.Name: Spur (Supreme)
Talent.Description: When activating and maintaining Spur, the beast only suffers 1 strain instead of 2.

Talent.Name: Soothing Tone
Talent.Description: Take a Soothing Tone action; make an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Knowledge (Xenology) check[b] to allow a beast to recover strain equal to [SU].

Talent.Name: High-G Training
Talent.Description: When a starship or vehicle being piloted would suffer system strain, may suffer strain up to ranks in High-G Training to prevent an equal amount of system strain.

Talent.Name: Corellian Sendoff
Talent.Description: Take a Correllin Sendoff action targeting two ships or vehicles at Close range; make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Cool check[b] to cause the targets to suffer a minor collision.

Talent.Name: Corellian Sendoff (Improved)
Talent.Description: When performing a Corellian Sendoff, the targets suffer a major collision instead.

Talent.Name: Koiogran Turn
Talent.Description: When an opponent has gained the advantage on a starship or vehicle being piloted, may perform a Koiogran Turn maneuver to remove the effects.

Talent.Name: Showboat
Talent.Description: When making a check in a starship or vehicle, may suffer 2 strain to gain [TR] on success or [DE] on failure.

Talent.Name: Larger Project
Talent.Description: Signature Vehicle can have a silhouette 1 larger per rank of Larger Project.

Talent.Name: Fancy Paint Job
Talent.Description: Upgrade all Charm, Deception, and Negotiation checks made in the presence of Signature Vehicle once.

Talent.Name: Signature Vehicle
Talent.Description: Choose one starship or vehicle as Signature Vehicle Upgrade all Mechanics checks made on that vehicle once.

Mod.MiscDesc: Upgrade the ability of all Mechanics checks made to work on this vehicle once.

Talent.Name: Overstocked Ammo
Talent.Description: Increase the value of the Limited Ammo quality of any weapons mounted on Signature Vehicle by 1 per rank of Overstocked Ammo.

Talent.Name: Tuned Maneuvering Thrusters
Talent.Description: Increase the handling of Signature Vehicle by 1 per rank of Tuned Maneuvering Thrusters.

Talent.Name: Bolstered Armor
Talent.Description: Increase the armor value of Signature Vehicle by 1 per rank of Bolstered Armor.

Talent.Name: Customized Cooling Unit
Talent.Description: Increase the system strain threshold of Signature Vehicle by 2 per rank of Customized Cooling Unit.

Talent.Name: Fortified Vacuum Seal
Talent.Description: Increase the hull trauma threshold of Signature Vehicle by 1 per rank of Fortified Vacuum Seal.

Talent.Name: Not Today
Talent.Description: Once per session, spend a Destiny Point to save Signature Vehicle from destruction.

Talent.Name: Reinforced Frame
Talent.Description: Signature Vehicle gains Massive 1: when making an attack targeting the ship or vehicle, the Critical rating of any weapon used counts as 1 higher.

Talent.Name: Supporting Evidence
Talent.Description: When assisting an ally with a Charm, Deception, Leadership, or Negotiation check, add automatic [AD] per rank of Supporting Evidence.

Talent.Name: Discredit
Talent.Description: Once per encounter, take the Discredit action, make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Deception check[b] to upgrade the difficulty of one character's social checks once, plus once for every [AD][AD], until of the encounter.

Talent.Name: Twisted Words
Talent.Description: When an incoming social check generates [TH][TH] or [DE], may suffer 1 strain as an incidental to inflict strain equal to ranks in Coercion on speaker.

Talent.Name: Plausible Deniability (Improved)
Talent.Description: Take an Improved Plausible Deniability action makes a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Coercion check[b] to convince one bystander per rank of Plausible Deniability to depart quietly.

Talent.Name: Encouraging Words
Talent.Description: After an engaged ally fails a check, may suffer 1 strain to assist that ally's next check this encounter as an out of turn incidental.

Talent.Name: Blackmail
Talent.Description: When an NPC exceeds his strain threshold, may spend 1 Destiny Point to convince that NPC to perform a single task of choice instead.

Talent.Name: Interjection
Talent.Description: After another character makes a social check, suffer 3 strain to take an interjection incidental make an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Vigilance check[b] to add [SU] or [FA] equal to [SU], and [AD] or [TH] equal to [AD] to the check.

Talent.Name: Contingency Plan
Talent.Description: Spend 1 Destiny Point to recover strain equal to Cunning rating.

Talent.Name: Sleight of Mind
Talent.Description: Add [BO] to all Stealth checks unless the opposition is immune to Force powers.

Talent.Name: Invigorate
Talent.Description: Once per encounter, may add [FO] to a check using Brawn or Agility made by an ally in short range [LI] add [SU] and [DA] add [TH].

Talent.Name: Force of Will
Talent.Description: Once per session, make one skill check using Willpower rather than the characteristic linked to that skill.

Talent.Name: Valuable Facts
Talent.Description: Once per encounter, perform a Valuable Facts action: make an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Knowledge check[b]. If successful, add [TR] to one ally's skill check during the enounter.

Talent.Name: Researcher (Improved)
Talent.Description: On a successful Knowledge check, character and allies gain automatic [AD] per rank of Researcher on checks to act on those facts until the end of his next turn.

Talent.Name: Encoded Communique
Talent.Description: Upgrade the difficulty of checks to decrypt this character's coded messages without the proper cipher a number of times equal to Computers skill.

Talent.Name: Know-It-All
Talent.Description: Once per session, perfectly recall an important fact previously learned as if a Destiny Point had been spent.

Talent.Name: Thorough Assessment
Talent.Description: Once per session, take a Thorough Assessment action: make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Knowledge check[b] to gain Boost dice equal to [SU] that can be distributed during the encounter.

Talent.Name: Positive Spin
Talent.Description: Whenever any character's Duty would increase, it increases by an additional 1 per rank of Positive Spin.

Talent.Name: Positive Spin (Improved)
Talent.Description: Once per session, if no PC's Duty triggered, make a [B]Daunting ([DI][DI][DI][DI]) Charm check[b] with the difficulty decreased once rank of Positive Spin to have one PC's Duty trigger.

Talent.Name: Bad Press
Talent.Description: Once per session, choose an organization and make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Deception check[b]. On success, organization members have their wound thresholds reduced by 1, plus 1 per [SU][SU][SU], until the end of the session.

Talent.Name: Informant
Talent.Description: Once per session, may reveal a contact who can shed light on a chosen subject.

Talent.Name: In The Know
Talent.Description: Remove [SE] up to ranks in In the Know from checks to get information from people or disseminate news. Minions NPCs do not realize this character's allegiance in interviews.

Talent.Name: In The Know (Improved)
Talent.Description: Once per session, make an [B]opposed Decepetion vs Vigilance[b] check with the difficulty downgraded once per rank of In the Know to have a target NPC believe specific false intelligence.

Talent.Name: Cutting Question
Talent.Description: Once per encounter, when making a Coercion skill check, the character may use Deception skill instead.

Talent.Name: Situational Awareness
Talent.Description: Allies with short range of the vehicle add [BO] to their Perception and Vigilance checks. Allies within close range add [BO][BO] instead.

Talent.Name: Idealist
Talent.Description: Spend 1 stain to add an [AD] on a skill check.

Talent.Name: Healing Trance
Talent.Description: Commit [FO]. For every full encounter [FO] remains committed, heal 1 wound per rank of Healing Trance.

Talent.Name: Physician
Talent.Description: When making a Medicine check to help a character heal wounds, the target heals 1 additional strain per rank of Physician.

Talent.Name: Knowledgeable Healing
Talent.Description: When healing an ally, spend 1 Destiny Point to heal additional wounds equal to ranks in Knowledge (Xenology).

Talent.Name: Healing Trance (Improved)
Talent.Description: When healing wounds due to Healing Trance, make a Resilience check to heal a Critical Injury. Difficulty of the check equals severity of the Critical Injurt.

Talent.Name: Calming Aura
Talent.Description: When an opponent targets character with a Force power, reduce [FP] generated by 1.

Talent.Name: Calming Aura (Improved)
Talent.Description: Spend a maneuver and suffer 2 strain to extend Calming Aura's effects to allies equal to Willpower at short range until start of next turn.

Talent.Name: Parry
Talent.Description: When hit by a melee attack, suffer 3 strain to reduce damage by 2 plus ranks in Parry.

Talent.Name: Parry (Improved)
Talent.Description: When parrying a hit that generate [DE] or [TH][TH][TH], may hit attacker once with Lightsaber, Brawl, or Melee weapon (dealing base damage) after original attack resolves.

Talent.Name: Reflect
Talent.Description: When hit by a ranged attack, suffer 3 strain to reduce damage by 2 plus ranks in Reflect.

Talent.Name: Defensive Training
Talent.Description: When wielding a Lightsaber, Melee, or Brawl weapon, the weapon gains the Defensive quality with a rating equal to ranks in Defensive Training.

Talent.Name: Niman Technique
Talent.Description: When making a Lightsaber skill check, the character may use Willpower instead of Brawn.

Talent.Name: Sum Djem
Talent.Description: May spend [TR] or [AD][AD] with a successful Lightsaber check to disarm opponent.

Talent.Name: Draw Closer
Talent.Description: Perform Draw Closer action; make a Lightsaber (Willpower) combat check against one silhouette 1 target within medium range, adding [FO] no greater than Force rating to check. Spend [FP] to move target one range band closer or to add [SU] to check.

Talent.Name: Center of Being
Talent.Description: Take a Center of Being maneuver. Until the beginning of next turn, attacks against the character increase their critical rating by 1 per rank of Center of Being.

Talent.Name: Force Assault
Talent.Description: Spend [TR] or [AD][AD][AD] on a missed Lightsaber (Willpower) combat check to immediately perform Move Force power action as maneuver.

Talent.Name: Center of Being (Improved)
Talent.Description: Suffer 1 strain to perform Center of Being maneuver as an incidental.

Talent.Name: One With The Universe
Talent.Description: Once per session, mediate, then perform One with the Universe action; make [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Astrogation check[b]. If successful, add [LI] to all Force power checks in next encounter. If successful with [TH], add [DA] instead.

Talent.Name: Preemptive Avoidance
Talent.Description: May spend 1 Destiny Point to disengage from engaged enemy as an out-of-turn incidental.

Talent.Name: The Force Is My Ally
Talent.Description: Once per session, may suffer 2 strain to perform Force power action as maneuver.

Talent.Name: Enhanced Leader
Talent.Description: When making a Leadership check, add [FO] no greater than Force rating. Spend [FP] to add [SU] or [AD] to the result.

Talent.Name: Unity Assault
Talent.Description: If a missed combat check generates [TR] or [AD][AD][AD], may spend to perform Force power targeting allies as a maneuver.

Talent.Name: Force Protection
Talent.Description: Perform the Force Protection maneuver; suffer 1 strain and commit [FO] up to ranks of Force Protection. Increase soak by number of [FO] committed until beginning of next turn. Suffer 1 strain every turn [FO] remains committed.

Talent.Name: Circle of Shelter
Talent.Description: When an engaged ally suffers a hit, may use Parry or Reflect incidental against the hit.

Talent.Name: Body Guard (Improved)
Talent.Description: Once per session, when an ally protected by the Body Guard maneuver suffers a hit, suffer the hit instead.

Talent.Name: Parry (Supreme)
Talent.Description: If the user did not make a combat check during his previous turn, may suffer 1 strain to use Parry.

Talent.Name: Strategic Form
Talent.Description: May take the Strategic Form action, making a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Lightsaber check[b] rolling [FO] no greater than Force rating. If successful, 1 target within short range may only attack character for 1 round. Spend [FP] to extend effects for 1 target for 1 round.

Talent.Name: Knowledge is Power
Talent.Description: Once per session, when making a check count Force rating as being equal to ranks in Knowledge (Lore).

Talent.Name: Sense Advantage
Talent.Description: Once per session, may add [SE][SE] to 1 NPC's skill check.

Talent.Name: Resist Disarm
Talent.Description: Suffer 2 strain to avoid being disarmed or have weapon damaged or destroyed.

Talent.Name: Makashi Technique
Talent.Description: When making a check using the Lightsaber skill, the character may use Presence instead of Brawn.

Talent.Name: Duelist's Training
Talent.Description: Add [BO] to Melee and Lightsaber checks when engaged with only one opponent.

Talent.Name: Feint
Talent.Description: Spend [TR] or [AD][AD][AD] generated on a missed melee attack to upgrade difficulty of opponent's next attack targeting character by ranks in Feint.

Talent.Name: Makashi Finish
Talent.Description: Take the Makashi Finish action; Perform a Lightsaber (Presence) combat check against engaged target, adding [FO] no greater than Force rating. Spend [FP] to add +10 to any resulting Critical Injury rolls.

Talent.Name: Makashi Flourish
Talent.Description: Once per encounter, perform Makashi Flourish action. Make an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Lightsaber (Presence) check[b]. 1 engaged opponent suffers strain equal to [SU], and heal an equal amount of strain.

Talent.Name: Keen Eyed
Talent.Description: Remove [SE] per rank of Keen Eyed from Perception and Vigilance checks. Decrease time to search a specific area by half.

Talent.Name: Forewarning
Talent.Description: Perform the Forewarning action. All allies within medium range increase defense by character's Force rating until they act in the encounter.

Talent.Name: Natural Mystic
Talent.Description: Once per session, may reroll any 1 Force power check.

Talent.Name: Conditioned
Talent.Description: Remove [SE] per rank of Conditioned from Athletics and Coordination check. Reduce the damage and strain suffered from falling by 1 per rank of Conditioned.

Talent.Name: Ataru Technique
Talent.Description: When making a check using the Lightsaber skill, the character may use Agility instead of Brawn.

Talent.Name: Hawk Bat Swoop
Talent.Description: Take the Hawk Bat Swoop action. Perform a Lightsaber (Agility) combat check against target within short range, adding [FO] no greater than Force rating. Spend [FP] to engage target and spend [FP] to add [AD] to check.

Talent.Name: Saber Swarm
Talent.Description: Perform the Saber Swarm maneuver; suffer 1 strain to make next Lightsaber (Agility) combat check this turn gain the Linked item quality equal to Force rating during check.

Talent.Name: Saber Throw
Talent.Description: Perform Saber Throw action; make Lightsaber combat check as ranged attack at target within medium range, adding [FO] no greater than Force rating. Must spend [FP] and succeed to hit target; spend [FP] to have weapon return to hand.

Talent.Name: Intuitive Shot
Talent.Description: When maing a Ranged (Heavy) or Range (Light) combat check, add [FO] no greater than Force rating to the check. May spend [FP] to add [SU] or [AD].

Talent.Name: Animal Empathy
Talent.Description: When making checks to handle or tame animals, add [FO] no greater than Force rating to the check. Spend [FP] to add [SU] or [AD] to the check.

Talent.Name: Animal Bond
Talent.Description: Develop long-term bond with single animal of silhouette no greater than half Force rating rounded down.

Talent.Name: Mental Bond
Talent.Description: May perform the Mental Bond action. Commit [FO]. While committed, may communicate with bonded animal at long range and see and hear through its senses.

Talent.Name: Quick Movement
Talent.Description: Suffer 2 strain to perform the Quick Movement incidental; add [FO] no greater than Force rating to next check. May spend [FP][FP] to perform one additional Move maneuver after action.

Talent.Name: Share Pain
Talent.Description: May perform the Share Pain incidental when bonded animal suffers wounds. Reduce wounds suffered to half, then character suffers wounds equal to number reduced.

Talent.Name: Mental Tools
Talent.Description: Always count as having the right tools for the job when performing Mechanics checks.

Talent.Name: Imbue Item
Talent.Description: Take the Imbue Item maneuver; suffer 1 strain and commit [FO] to grant one weapon, piece of armor, or item an improvement while [FO] remains committed. Suffer 1 strain every round [FO] remains committed.

Talent.Name: Master Artisan
Talent.Description: Once per round, may take the Master Artisan Incidental; suffer 2 strain to decrease the difficulty of next Mechanics check by 1, to a minimum of [B]Easy ([DI])[b].

Talent.Name: Intuitive Improvements
Talent.Description: When making check to craft or repair item, may add [FO] no greater than Force rating to check. Spend [FP][FP] to increase hard points by 1, to max of +2.

Talent.Name: Comprehend Technology
Talent.Description: Take Comprehend Technology action; make an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Knowledge (Education) check[b] to use Force rating as ranks in skills to use a single item.

Talent.Name: Shroud
Talent.Description: The character may spend 1 Destiny Point to make himself undetectable via Force powers and make his own powers go unnoticed for the remainder of the encounter.

Talent.Name: Slippery Minded
Talent.Description: If under the effects of a Force power, perform the Slippery Minded action; make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Deception check[b] to immediately end effects of power.

Talent.Name: Now You See Me
Talent.Description: Once per session, take Now You See Me action. Make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Deception check[b] to make a number of NPC's equal to Cunning within medium range forget about character.

Talent.Name: Shien Technique
Talent.Description: When making a check using the Lightsaber skill, the character may use Cunning instead of Brawn.

Talent.Name: Counterstrike
Talent.Description: When an attack misses the character and generates [DE] or [TH][TH], may upgrade next Lightsaber (Cunning) check against attacker during encounter once.

Talent.Name: Reflect (Improved)
Talent.Description: When reflecting a hit that generated [DE] or [TH][TH][TH] may hit one target in medium range with the same damage as the initial hit, after original attack resolves.

Talent.Name: Djem So Deflection
Talent.Description: After using Reflect, may spend 1 Destiny Point to perform Move maneuver as out-of-turn incidental to close distance with or engage opponent.

Talent.Name: Falling Avalanche
Talent.Description: Suffer 2 strain to add damage equal to Brawn to next Lightsaber combat check made that turn.

Talent.Name: Disruptive Strike
Talent.Description: Perform Disruptive Strike action; make a Lightsaber (Cunning) combat check, adding [FO] no greater than Force rating. Spend [FP] to add [FA] to the next combat check the target makes.

Talent.Name: Reflect (Supreme)
Talent.Description: If the user did not make a combat check during previous turn, may suffer 1 strain to use Reflect.

Talent.Name: Drive Back
Talent.Description: The Inquisitor may spend [TR] or [AD][AD][AD] on a missed Brawl, Melee, or Lightsaber combat check to force target to make a move maneuver in a direction of the Inquisitor's choice.

Talent.Name: Prey on the Weak
Talent.Description: Add +1 damage to one hit of successful combat checks against disoriented targets per rank of Prey on the Weak.

Talent.Name: Terrify
Talent.Description: Take the Terrify action; make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Coercion check[b], adding [FO] no greater than Force rating. Disorient one target within medium range per [SU]. Spend [AD][AD] to extend duration and spend [FP] to immobilize affected target.

Talent.Name: Terrify (Improved)
Talent.Description: Reduce the difficulty of Terrify's check to [B]Average ([DI][DI])[b] and may spend [TR] to stagger an affected target.

Talent.Name: Against All Odds
Talent.Description: When incapacitated, perform Against All Odds action; making [B] Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Resilience check[b] with [FO] equal to Force rating. Heal wounds equal to [SU], spend [FP] to add [SU].

Talent.Name: Multiple Opponents
Talent.Description: Add [BO] to Lightsaber, Brawl, and Melee checks when engaged with multiple opponents.

Talent.Name: Natural Blademaster
Talent.Description: Once per session, may reroll any 1 Lightsaber or Melee check.

Talent.Name: Sarlacc Sweep
Talent.Description: Increase difficulty of Lightsaber check by 1 to perform Sarlacc Sweep action. May spend [AD][AD] to hit additional engaged targets.

Talent.Name: Intuitive Evasion
Talent.Description: Perform the Intuitive Evasion maneuver; suffer 1 strain and commit [FO] up to ranks of Intuitive Evasion. Upgrade difficulty of combat checks targeting starship or vehicle by equal amount. Suffer 1 strain every round [FO] remains committed.

Talent.Name: Intuitive Strike
Talent.Description: When making a combat check with a planetary scale weapon, add [FO] no greater than Force rating to the check. Spend [FP][FP] to add [SU] or [AD].

Talent.Name: Defensive Circle
Talent.Description: May take the Defensive Circle action, making a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Lightsaber (Intellect) check[b]. The character, plus one ally within short range per [SU], gains X defense until the beginning of next turn. X equals 1, plus 1 per [AD][AD].

Talent.Name: Suppressing Fire
Talent.Description: The character and each ally within short range may spend [AD] on their failed combat checks to inflict one strain on the target per rank of Supressing Fire. Each character can only activate this effect once per round.

Talent.Name: Prophetic Aim
Talent.Description: While benefiting from an Aim maneuver, [DE] from the character's Ranged (Heavy) and Ranged (Light) checks cannot cause attacks to hit allies engaged with the target.

Talent.Name: Reinforce Item
Talent.Description: Take the Reinforce Item maneuver: commit [LI][LI] to grant one weapon or piece of armor the Cortosis quality while [LI][LI] remains committed. Suffer 3 strain every round [LI][LI] remain committed.

Talent.Name: Prime Positions
Talent.Description: When this character or an ally in short range takes cover, he increases soak against ranged attacks by 1 per rank of Prim Positions until he leaves that cover.

Talent.Name: Prescient Shot
Talent.Description: Add [BO] to all Ranged (Light) checks unless the target is immune to Force powers.

Talent.Name: Precision Strike
Talent.Description: When this character inflicts a Critical Injury with a Brawl, Melee, or Lightsaber weapon, may suffer 1 strain to change the result to any [B]Easy ([DI])[b] Critical Injury result.

Talent.Name: Grapple
Talent.Description: Once per round, the character may perform the Grapple maneuver. Until the beginning of the character's next turn, enemies must spend two maneuvers instead of one maneuver to move from engaged range to short range of him.

Talent.Name: Overbalance
Talent.Description: Whenever an enemy engaged with the character makes a combat check, after the attack is resolved, the character may spend [DE] or [TH][TH][TH] to stagger the attacker until the end of the attacker's next turn.

Talent.Name: No Escape
Talent.Description: May spend [AD][AD] from a Coercion check or [TH][TH] from a foe's Discipline check; that target cannot perform a free maneuver during his next turn.

Talent.Name: Baleful Gaze
Talent.Description: When targeted by combat check from within medium range, may spend a Destiny Point to upgrade the difficulty of the check a number of times equal to ranks in Coercion.

Talent.Name: Blind Spot
Talent.Description: The character and allies within short range add automatic [AD] to combat checks they make while benefitting from cover.

Talent.Name: Armor Master (Supreme)
Talent.Description: Once per round, when the character suffers a Critical Injury, he may suffer 3 strain to take the Armor Master incidental. If he does he reduces the Critical Injury result that he suffers by 10 per point of his soak, to a minimum of 1.

Talent.Name: Cunning Stunt
Talent.Description: Use Cunning instead of Presence for Cool checks.

Talent.Name: Soresu Technique
Talent.Description: When making a Lightsaber skill check, the character may use Intellect instead of Brawn.

Talent.Name: Finesse
Talent.Description: Use Agility instead of Brawn for Brawl or Melee checks.

Talent.Name: Supreme Speaks Binary
Talent.Description: Once per encounter, may perform the Speaks Binary maneuver. A number of NPC droids up to ranks in Speaks Binary may use the character's ranks for 1 skill of character's choice.

Talent.Name: Improved Speaks Binary
Talent.Description: When directing NPC droids, those droids grand additional [BO] in addition to other benefits.

Talent.Name: Resourceful Refit
Talent.Description: May perform the Resourceful Refit action, make an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Mechanics check[b] to scavenge an old attachment to construct a new one, reducing its price by that of the dismantled attachment.

Talent.Name: Reroute Processors
Talent.Description: Once per encounter, may take a Reroute Processors action, make an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Computers check[b] to reduce one of a droid's characteristics by 1 and increase another of its characteristics by 1.

Talent.Name: Supreme Overcharge
Talent.Description: May perform the Overcharge action on any number of installed cybernetics. On [DE], one overcharged cybernetic shorts out.

Talent.Name: Improved Overcharge
Talent.Description: May spend [AD][AD] or [TR] from Overcharge action to immediately take another action.

Talent.Name: Overcharge
Talent.Description: Once per encounter, may use the Overcharge action. Make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Mechanics check[b]. On success one installed cybernetic provides additional benefits. On [DE], overcharged cybernetic shorts out.

Talent.Name: More Machine Than Man
Talent.Description: Increase cybernetic implant cap by 1 per rank of More Machine than Man.

Talent.Name: Machine Mender
Talent.Description: When making a Mechanics check to help a character heal wounds, the target heals 1 additional wound per rank of Machine Mender.

Talent.Name: Energy Transfer
Talent.Description: May suffer 1 strain to use the Energy Transfer meneuver to power up an unpowered device or replenish exhausted ammunition for an energy weapon.

Talent.Name: Eye for Detail
Talent.Description: After making a Mechanics or Computers check, may suffer strain up to ranks in Eye for Detail to convert that many [SU] to [AD].

Talent.Name: Engineered Redundancies
Talent.Description: Gain the ability to use emergency repair patches to heal. Additionally, can be healed with Mechanics checks.

Talent.Name: Deft Maker
Talent.Description: Remove [SE] per rank of Deft Maker from checks to repair, modify, construct, or program droids. Reduce the material cost to craft droids by 50%.

Talent.Name: Cyberneticist
Talent.Description: Remove [SE] per rank of Cyberneticist from checks to build, repair, and install cybernetic implants . Cybernetics cost 50% less.

Talent.Name: Custom Loadout
Talent.Description: May add 2 additional hard points to Signature Vehicles.

Talent.Name: Well Read
Talent.Description: Choose any 3 Knowledge skills. They permanently become career skills.

Talent.Name: That's How It's Done
Talent.Description: May suffer 1 strain on successful skill check to add [AD] to the same skill check made by a number of allies equally to Willpower within short range during the next round.

Talent.Name: Ready for Anything
Talent.Description: Remove [SE] per rank of Ready for Anything on Mass Combat checks and Cool or Vigiliance checks to determine Initiateve order.

Talent.Name: Ready for Anything (Improved)
Talent.Description: When making Cool or Vigilance checks to determine Initiative order, may spend [TR] to add [SU] equal to rnaks in Ready for Anything.

Talent.Name: Natural Instructor
Talent.Description: Once per session, may reroll one Discipline or Leadership check.

Talent.Name: Master Strategist
Talent.Description: Once per phase during a mass combat, may suffer 2 strain to decrease difficulty of a Mass Combat check once.

Talent.Name: Master Instructor
Talent.Description: Once per round as an out of turn incidental, may suffer 2 strain to allow ally to use character's ranks in Discipline for next Discipline check an ally makes.

Talent.Name: Confidence (Improved)
Talent.Description: May decrease difficulty of Discipline checks to avoid fear by 1 per rank of Confidence.

Talent.Name: Commanding Presence (Improved)
Talent.Description: Once per session, may take Commanding Presence action; make an opposed [B]Cool vs. Discipline[b] check to force target to leave the encounter.

Talent.Name: Clever Commander
Talent.Description: May use ranks in Knowledge (Warfare) to upgrade Mass Combat checks instead of ranks in Leadership.

Talent.Name: Calm Commander
Talent.Description: May use ranks in Cool to upgrade Mass Combat checks instead of ranks in Leadership.

Talent.Name: Seize the Initiative
Talent.Description: Once per session, as a maneuver, may make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Athletics check[b]. On success, other PCs may take their turns immediately.

Talent.Name: Moving Target
Talent.Description: If the character has already acted this round, increase ranged defense by 1 per rank of moving target.

Talent.Name: Cunning Snare
Talent.Description: Once per encounter as an action, amy create a trap. Any other character wh moves to engaged range of the trap must make an [B]Opposed Vigilance vs. Survival check[b] to avoid harm and ill effects.

Talent.Name: Ambush
Talent.Description: Once per round while benefiting from cover, may make the Ambush maneuver. Add damage equal to Stealth skill to one hit of next successful combat check against a target within short range before the end of the turn.

Talent.Name: Body Guard (Supreme)
Talent.Description: Body Guard maneuver may protect a number of engaged characters up to ranks in Reilience.

Talent.Name: Superhuman Reflexes
Talent.Description: Once per session, after generatin [DE] on a Piloting check cancel the [DE] and add [SU] equal to ranks in Cool.

Talent.Name: Street Smarts (Improved)
Talent.Description: Once per session, amy take an Improved Street Smarts action; make a [B]Formidible ([DI][DI][DI][DI][DI]) Streetwise[b] or [B]Knowledge (Underworld) check[b] toe learn one vital clue from the GM. Reduce the difficulty oncer per rank of Street Smarts.

Talent.Name: Sense the Scene
Talent.Description: Perform the Sense the Scene action; make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Perception check[b] and add [FO] no greater than Force rating. If successful, spend [FP] to identify the emotional characteristics of one person involved in the crime.

Talent.Name: Saber Throw (Improved)
Talent.Description: When performing the Saber Throw action, may increase the range to long range. When attacking a target at long range, spend [FP][FP] to have weapon return to hand.

Talent.Name: Reconstruct the Scene
Talent.Description: Perform the Reconstruct the Scene action; make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Perception check[b] to identify the physical characteristics of person present at the scene within 24 hours.

Talent.Name: Impossible Fall
Talent.Description: Once per session, perform Impossible Fall incidental when falling: make Force power check and spend [FP][FP] to decrese fall by one range band and land somewhere safe. Spend [FP] to decrease distance by one additional range band.

Talent.Name: Freerunning
Talent.Description: Suffer 1 strain when making a Move maneuver to move to any location within short range.

Talent.Name: Freerunning (Improved)
Talent.Description: Suffer 4 strain when making a move maneuver to move to any location within medium range.

Talent.Name: Fear the Shadows
Talent.Description: Perform the Fear the Shadows action: make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Deception check[b] to force a single minion group or rival to flee the encounter.

Talent.Name: Constant Vigilance
Talent.Description: May always use Vigilance when making checks to determine initiative.

Talent.Name: Better Luck Next Time
Talent.Description: Take a Better Luck Next Tiem action; make a [B]Hard([DI][DI][DI]) Cool check[b] to force a competitor to suffer a major misfortune.

Talent.Name: Terrifying Kill
Talent.Description: The character may spend 1 Destiny Point to take the Terrifying Kill mane.

Talent.Name: Survival of the Fittest
Talent.Description: Once per session, when making a single check the character may treat his Force rating as being equal to ranks in Survival.

Talent.Name: Studious Plotting
Talent.Description: When making a Streetwise or Survival skill check to navigate on a world, the character may use Intellect instead of Cunning.

Talent.Name: Shortcut (Improved)
Talent.Description: When engaging in a chase or race, may suffer 2 strain to add [SU] equal to ranks in Shortcut to the check.

Talent.Name: Planet Mapper
Talent.Description: Remove [SE] per rank of Planet Mapper from Streetwise or Survival checks used for navigation on a world. Such checks also take half normal time.

Talent.Name: One with Nature
Talent.Description: When in the wilderness, the character may make a [B]Simple (-) Survival check[b] instead of Discipline or Cool to recover starin at the end of an encounter.

Talent.Name: Mind Over Matter
Talent.Description: The character may spend one Destiny Point to recover strain equal to to his Willpower rating.

Talent.Name: Menace
Talent.Description: Enemy within short range of the character's bonded animal adds [SE] to next Combat check made against the character.

Talent.Name: Marked for Death
Talent.Description: Take the Marked for Death maneuver; commiting [FO]. Add [AD][AD] to combat checks against target while [FO] remains committed but cannot use this talent again until the original target is incapacitated or the session ends.

Talent.Name: Essential Kill
Talent.Description: When making a non-Gunnery combat check, the character may add [FO] no greater than his Force rating to the check. The character may spend [FP] to add [AD] or [FP][FP][FP] to add [TR] (character's choice) to the result.

Talent.Name: Deathblow
Talent.Description: After making a successful attack with a non-starship/vehicle weapon, the character may spend one Destiny Point to add damage equal to his Willpower to one hit of the successful attack.

Talent.Name: Iron Body
Talent.Description: Remove [SE] per rank of Iron Body from Coordination and Resilience checks. Reduce the critical rating of unarmed attacks by 1 per rank of Iron Body (to a minimum of 1).

Talent.Name: Unarmed Parry
Talent.Description: May Parry while unarmed Reduce strain cost to Parry while unarmed by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

Talent.Name: Precision Strike (Supreme)
Talent.Description: When this character inflicts a Critical Injury with a Brawl, Melee, or Lightsaber wepaon, may suffer 1 strain to chang the result to any [B]Easy ([DI])[b] Critical Injury.

Talent.Name: Precision Strike (Improved)
Talent.Description: Once per round, when inflicting a Critical Injury with a Brawl or Melee weapon, may suffer 2 strain to change the result to any [B]Average ([DI][DI])[b] Critical injury.

Talent.Name: Martial Grace
Talent.Description: Once per round, suffers 2 strain to add damage equal to ranks in Coordination to next Brawl check made this turn.

Talent.Name: Offensive Driving
Talent.Description: As a maneuver, suffer system strain up to vehicle's highest defense to upgrade the difficulty of traget's next Piloting check that many times.

Talent.Name: Hindering Shot
Talent.Description: Increase the difficulty of next Gunnery check by 1. If check deals damage, target starship or vehicle suffers system strain equal to speed when it moves until the end of the encounter..

Talent.Name: Hard-Boiled
Talent.Description: When recovering strain after an encounter, may spend [AD] up to ranks in Hard-Boiled to recover 1 wound per [AD] spent.

Talent.Name: Animal Bond (Improved)
Talent.Description: When spending a maneuver to direct a bonded animal, the character may suffer 1 strain to add [BO] to the animals next check.

Talent.Name: Force Connection
Talent.Description: When the character performs a Survival or Knowledgen(Xenology) skill check, he may roll [FO] no greater than his Force rating. The character may spend [FP] to add [SU] or [AD] (character's choice) to the result.

Talent.Name: Harass
Talent.Description: Whenever the character's bonded animal makes a successful combat check against a target, it may forgo inflicting damage to upgrade the difficulty of the target's next check once instead.

Talent.Name: Holistic Navigation
Talent.Description: When making an Astrogation skill check, the character may spend one Destiny Point to remove [DE], or to remove [TH] equal to his ranks in Perception.

Talent.Name: Intuitive Navigation
Talent.Description: When performing an Astrogation or Knowledge (Outer Rim) skill check, the character may roll [FO] no greater than his Force rating. The character may spend [FP] to ass [SU] or [AD] (character's choice) to the result.

Talent.Name: Stubborn
Talent.Description: Upgrade the difficulty of checks to train this mount by 1 per rank.

Talent.Name: Domesticated
Talent.Description: Difficulty for training this beast is not upgraded.

Talent.Name: Flyer
Talent.Description: This mount can fly. When on the ground, it's Speed is reduced to 1.

Talent.Name: Beast of Burden
Talent.Description: Add 1 per rank to the mount's encumbrance threshold.

Talent.Name: Trained Mount
Talent.Description: Add [BO] per rank to a rider's Survival checks while mounted on this mount.

Talent.Name: Domesticable
Talent.Description: Downgrade the difficulty of checks to train this mount by 1 per rank.
